item.title: ELECTRONIC FLIGHT BAG (EFB) SYSTEM – CLASS 3 EFB (BOEING) – BOTH SYSTEMS INOPERATIVE

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

note.para: Any function, program or document which is operative may be used.

numlitem.para: Crews will use their paper manuals and charts in their flight kits or the ship's library.

note.para: A minimum of one CDTI required for Merging & Spacing or CAVS operations.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to EFB Display Units "BOTH EFB'S (functionality) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Document specific inoperative function in Aircraft Logbook.
